item.title: I Think DC Just Nailed The Perfect Story For DCU’s Batman Movie Years Before We’ll Ever See It
item.description: As details for the DCU's The Brave and the Bold emerge, I think we might have just been given the perfect story in a distinct Batman adaptation.

item.title: After The Penguin, I Actually Don’t Want The Joker To Be In The Batman 2
item.description: The Batman 2 doesn't make sense to introduce the Joker as the primary villain, and The Penguin just proved what the Batverse can do without him.

item.title: Gladiator 2 Box Office Will Finally Surpass Massive Budget With New Global Milestone
item.description: Gladiator 2 is closing in on a key box office milestone just one week into its theatrical release that is also big news for its massive budget.
